author: diguida
body:
New set of GTs with the following additions:
- Run2 design GT:
  - adding AK4PF and AK4PFchs JEC
- Run2 MC GTs (both 50 and 25 ns):
  - adding AK4PF and AK4PFchs JEC
- Run1 data GT:
  - adding AK4PF and AK4PFchs JEC
- Run2 data GT:
  - adding AK4PF and AK4PFchs JEC
title: Adding AK4PF JEC to Run2 MC and data GTs.
